ygData.subject: Believe or Not AGAIN
ygData.msgSnippet: You can accumulate money by letting slime multiply, killing all but one of them, and end up restoring the slime to full experience level with money left over.

You can accumulate money by letting slime multiply, killing all but one of them, and end up restoring the slime to full experience level 
with money left over.

Hence, the slime on my current team is called "Revenue".
